about_the_game:
This donation effects nothing what-so-ever and is just for pure kindness and generosity.

*DLC is completely optional and does not change the gameplay in anyway, shape or form.*
detailed_description:
This donation effects nothing what-so-ever and is just for pure kindness and generosity.

*DLC is completely optional and does not change the gameplay in anyway, shape or form.*
legal_notice: Fesnia is the sole property of Syu-Syu aka Syukino. It is also apart of Team Syukino.
name: Fesnia- Rose Donation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better Display

short_description: Purchase this donation and help support Team Syukino's future games and updates.
